title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Level up your AWS Network Firewall rules for maximum protection (SEC231)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 升级您的 AWS Network Firewall 规则以实现最大保护 (SEC231)
abstract: Learn how to harness the full potential of AWS Network Firewall in this focused lightning talk. Explore advanced techniques for custom Suricata rules, discover the power of managed rules, and understand active threat defense implementation. Walk away with actionable insights to strengthen your network security controls.
abstract_cn: 在这个重点闪电演讲中学习如何充分发挥 AWS Network Firewall 的全部潜力。探索自定义 Suricata 规则的高级技术,发现托管规则的强大功能,并了解主动威胁防御的实施。带走可操作的见解以加强您的网络安全控制。
